name: CXStartCallAction
desc: An encapsulation of the act of initiating an outgoing call.

items.name: init(call: UUID, handle: CXHandle)
items.desc: Initializes a new action to start a call with the specified UUID to a recipient with the specified handle.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action to start a call with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var isVideo: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call is a video call.

items.name: var contactIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the call recipient.

items.name: var handle: CXHandle
items.desc: The handle of the call recipient.

items.name: func fulfill(withDateStarted: Date)
items.desc: Reports the successful execution of the action at the specified time.
